title: Molly Fyde and the Fight for Peace
description: Reading 1. Molly Fyde and the Parsona Rescue2. Molly Fyde and the Land of Light3. Molly Fyde and the Blood of Billions4. Molly Fyde and the Fight for PeaceIn the conclusion to the Bern Saga, Molly and her friends are reunited while two wars erupt. An entire universe hangs on the actions of Parsona's crew, and not all of them will survive.
author: Hugh Howey
